title: Games Voice Assistant
description:
Game voice assistant that can help the players play a game without hands
using voice only. Focus on helping people with disabilities. working with google TTS and STT, DialogFlow and Selenium in python.

title: Accessible Court Data
description:
Making the data more accessible and easier to visualize to get sense of the data.
Using scraping, parsing and ELK with hebrew morphology to get the best results.

title: Cost Manager Android App
description:
